issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
It is not a regression.
Its occurring since sdk 2.1.4.GA

Steps to reproduce:
1. Click on Base UI > Views>Web Views>Local URL
2. Tap on local URL
3. Tap on 'Click Me to Hide the Toolbar'

Actual:
Tapping on webview local url shifts the screen towards the right and Toolbar is getting hidden.

Expected:
Toolbar should be hidden and page screen should not shift.
fields.summary: Android: Kitchen Sink, Tapping on webview local url shifts the screen towards the right

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
